rough guide to world music unplugged (various artists)
data.meta_description: This wonderfully diverse musical travelogue takes us from African and Latin rhythms to Chinese and Indian cultures and beyond. Uncluttered by technology an
data.text: This wonderfully diverse musical travelogue takes us from African and Latin rhythms to Chinese and Indian cultures and beyond. Uncluttered by technology and over-production, these acoustic performances spotlight today’s living masters of endangered traditions and instruments: "Yekul Song" Hangaii, "Heya!" Monoswezi, "Malloumi" Mamane Barka, "Sanhu Love Song" Manhu, "Izinyembezi" Shiyani Ngcobo, "Jaleuleu Ja" Sambasunda Quintet, "Gorée" Nuru Kane, "Marice" Söndörgö, "Goodbye Again" Guo Yue & Joji Hirota and more! World Network.
